Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Prospect
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Beverly and 103rd: due to, street blockage near 103rd/Prospect.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Longwood, 99th, Beverly and 103rd: due to, street blockage near 103rd/Prospect.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near State/Pershing
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Pershing, Wabash, 38th and State, due to street blockage near State/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Pershing, Wabash, 38th and State, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near State/Pershing.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
